forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 2pm. Partly sunny. High near 85, with temperatures falling to around 83 in the afternoon. East wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 63. East northeast wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 85, with temperatures falling to around 83 in the afternoon. East wind 2 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 64. East southeast wind 2 to 7 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
